overview: When the Golden State Warriors headed into the 2017-18 NBA campaign, they were presented with a glorious opportunity to join some very select company: teams that not only won consecutive titles, but also three out of four. The defending champions had hoisted the Larry O'Brien Trophy in two of the preceding three seasons, but they were all too familiar of the pitfalls in trying to repeat.
title: 2018 NBA Champions: Golden State Warriors
